trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException"></xref> class is an abstract class used as the base class for all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols"></xref> exceptions.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException"></xref> class using the specified parameter.
The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException"></xref> class using the specified serialization information and streaming contextual information.
The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The contextual information about the source or destination.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>, if any, that threw the exception.
